title: Smoking Cessation Intervention Education Before and After Surgery: Enhancing Interaction Through Adaptive Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Combines online modules with in-person practical sessions using digital devices, enhancing adaptive learning and interactive activities tailored to learners' prior knowledge levels

learning_goals: Learners can explain the importance and physiological effects of smoking cessation before and after surgery with over 90% accuracy
Learners can implement personalized smoking cessation intervention strategies through adaptive learning modules with over 80% application accuracy
Learners can perform smoking cessation counseling techniques according to patient types with self-efficacy scores of 4/5 or higher through interactive simulations
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
